product_name: Chaco OutCross Lace Water Shoes - Women's
long_description: The amphibious, trail-ready Chaco OutCross Lace Water Shoes offer a breathable design with single-handed lace adjustment and protective toe caps for your adventures on the river. Featuring supportive American Podiatric Medical Association-certified PU LUVSEAT(TM) footbeds and Vibram(R) outsoles for added durability and traction. Synthetic leather and mesh provide drainage, breathability and quick drying capability. Webbing straps conform to your feet and the tethered laces secure the fit. Rubber toecaps and heels protect feet from rocks both in the water and on the trails. Polyeurethane midsoles offer support and durability. Thermoplastic urethane shanks offer additional support. Chaco OutCross Lace Water Shoes have nonmarking Vibram TC-1 rubber with siped center lugs for unparalleled traction on wet surfaces; 3mm lug depth.
short_description: The amphibious, trail-ready Chaco OutCross Lace Water Shoes offer a breathable design with single-handed lace adjustment and protective toe caps for your adventures on the river.
